Text: I do all my mountain climbing sitting on my couch watching Discovery Channel and drinking beer

I totally agree, except I sit in a lounge chair, watching movies on SyFy and drinking coffee. 

We're so alike it's scary.
This book is a wakeup call to you lazy boys !!

Lazy is good when it keeps you alive!

I watched the documentary on Everest when 8 lives were lost in a single day.I watched it on my couch in the comfort of my warm home with a cold beer and plenty of air
